### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE CustomerContactInformation (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name STRING,
    last_name STRING,
    email_address STRING,
    phone_number STRING
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE CustomerContactInformation SET email_address = 'example1@gmail.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
